import React from 'react' import {Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; function PlaceOrderScreen() { const {shippingAddress, paymentMethod, cartItems} = useSelector(state => state.cart); return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {shippingAddress.address}, {shippingAddress.city}, {shippingAddress.postalCode}, {shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {paymentMethod},

Order Items

{cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your Cart is Empty ): ( {cartItems.map((item, index)=> ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${/*cart.itemsPrice*/} Shipping ${/*cart.shippingPrice*/} Tax ${/*cart.taxPrice*/} Total ${/*cart.totalPrice*/} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
